title: Girls Learn to Ride Dirt Bikes -- /RideApart
description: Nine-Time National MX champion Mercedes Natvig teaches a group of girls how to ride dirt bikes at the Honda Rider Education Center in Colton, California. If these girls can do it, what's your excuse?

asset.title: Girls Learn to Ride Dirt Bikes -- /RideApart
asset.description:
Nine-Time National MX champion Mercedes Natvig teaches a group of girls how to ride dirt bikes at the Honda Rider Education Center in Colton, California. If these girls can do it, what's your excuse?

For more on motorcycles check out http://RideApart.com
